creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: crushed indigo and batik panels, with decorative embroidery borders; body of jacket: nine crushed indigo panels flaring at waist; red, off-white, indigo and green embroidered hem; magenta and off-white chevron stitch border; front opening bordered with red, green, white, black and blue geometric embroidery and weaving; collar and shoulder straps: red fabric with metallic gold border; blue, purple, off-white and black floral embroidery; sleeve panels: spiral and geometric blue, off-white and yellow dyed design; crushed indigo panels; white hem panels with blue line stitching; jacket ties with purple, black and white ties
title: Jacket
